subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: LaTroy Hawkins is the major leagues’ longest-tenured player, having joined in 1995. He has a chance to become the 16th player to pitch in 1,000 games.
snippet: LaTroy Hawkins is the major leagues’ longest-tenured player, having joined in 1995. He has a chance to become the 16th player to pitch in 1,000 games.
